column4: Hi guys, my gnome applications menu is empty...if I click on edit menu nothing happens
i would do a repair installation
repair installation ? how ?
was that for me ? that sounds quote stupid to me
yes I am aware of that
I am not sure if you are talking to me...
di u ever have a good installation to begin with?
of course
I have been upgrading since ubuntu 8.04 on this very machine, never had to re-install
I am on 10.04 right now
i noticed some strange behavior when i installed 10.04, and i ended up sticking in ext 3 and for me the oddities disappeared ...coincidence..dunno.
hmmm I am on ext4...
ok, although I have a difficult time believing that the menu problem has got anything to do with it
I was having perfectly good menu, I think my system crashed because of some memory issue in the middle of when I was editing the menu
its kinda clear to me that the config file or whatever the menu uses must have gotten corrupted then
I am trying to get some help fixing it
that's unfortunate
but how can I migrate to ext3 without destroying my data ?
I will consider doing that sometime soon perhaps
same issue ?
ahh ok
hmm
